title: Pixel 4 Video Settings?
content:
The Pixel 4 is suppose to offer the following modes for shooting video:

Video: 1080p @ 30, 60, or 120 fps; 720p @ 240 fps; 4K @ 30 fps; Front Camera: 1080p @ 30 fps

I am only able to find one video quality setting - Ultra 4K.  I cannot find any way to change frame rate, nor to to select 720p or 1080p.

Please advise.  Thanks.
